name: Oroville Peak
description:
One quiet morning, the peaceful town of Oroville Peak is struck by a disaster

Name of game:     Oroville Peak

Submission name:   DoktorPlekter_OrovillePeak

Assets created before jam

I used a couple of assets from "Olberts Low Poly Biomes pack" to spice up my foliage a bit. All "low-ground" foliage is from the pack (with custom materials though), but the trees are modeled by me! 

I also used (but modified) 3 particle-effects from W3Studios' "50 + Vector Particles" pack. 

Here is an external download link to the game in case the itch-dl isn't working for some reason!
